Overview

The Product Review Analysis Application is designed to help users gain insights from customer reviews and ratings stored in a CSV file. By uploading the file, users can ask specific questions, and the application will analyze the data to provide meaningful answers. This tool is ideal for businesses, marketers, and data analysts looking to understand customer sentiments, product feedback, or overall trends.


Key Features

Natural Language Query Processing

  • Users can ask questions in natural language (e.g., "What is the average rating?" or "Find reviews mentioning 'delivery'").
  • Intelligent parsing to identify query intent.

Data Analysis and Summarization

  • Summarizes overall customer sentiment (positive, negative, neutral).
  • Provides key metrics such as average rating, most common phrases, and sentiment distribution.

Prompt Library Integration

  • Predefined queries available in the Prompt Library for ease of use.
  • Example prompts include:
  • "What are customers saying about the style and design of [Product]?"
  • "How satisfied are customers with [Product's feature]?"

Customizable Queries

  • Supports filtering by keywords, date range, or rating thresholds.
  • Allows for advanced queries such as "Show negative reviews with ratings below 3."

Export Results

  • Allows exporting analyzed data and summaries in multiple formats, including CSV and PDF.

How It Works

Upload Your File

  • Ensure your CSV file includes at least two columns: Review and Rating.
  • Optional: Include additional metadata such as Date, Reviewer Name, or Product ID.

Use Prompt Library or Type Custom Queries

  • Select a predefined query from the Prompt Library or type your question in the input box.
  • Examples of questions:
  • "What is the overall average rating?"
  • "List reviews with the keyword 'quality'."
  • "What percentage of reviews are positive?"

View Results

  • The application will display a detailed answer, charts, or summaries based on your query.
  • Predefined queries from the Prompt Library help simplify analysis for common use cases.

Export Insights

  • Save your findings by exporting the data in your preferred format.

Use Cases

  • Customer Feedback Analysis: Identify recurring themes in customer feedback.
  • Product Improvement: Spot common complaints or suggestions for product enhancement.
  • Market Research: Understand customer sentiments about competitors by analyzing reviews from different sources.
